EmailTemplate.description: Sends email to owner when feedback record is in open status and assigned to the owner
EmailTemplate.name: Feedback: Send Email To Owner On Feedback Assignment
EmailTemplate.subject: New Knowledge Feedback Assignment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Feedback__c.OwnerFullName},
A new feedback record, {!Feedback__c.Link}, has been assigned to you. Click on the feedback link to navigate to the feedback to review and resolve. Please review the feedback within 3 business days.
Sincerely,
DCP Knowledge
